text:
Whoa, wait, Meguru-chan...!?
is that Meguru-chan...!?

Hey, it's amazing...!
So many people came to see us...!

Yeah,
we have people here cheering us on too...!
Ah, they must have gathered to catch a glimpse of Meguru.

And, look here,
we have fan letters and gifts.

Huh... All of these are addressed to me...?!
Wow... I'm so happy...!

So many people were waiting for Meguru...
Let's do our best in this job.

Of course! ...By the way, Producer,
is it okay to read fan letters during breaks?

Yay...!
Hehe, I wonder what they wrote...!
